EmailTemplate.name: Content Syndication Lead Gen - Q118.Selling Simplified Lead Email - Crossing - 5
EmailTemplate.subject: Complimentary ebooks, white papers, infographics, webinars, and events
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We noticed that you recently checked out one of our white papers, so we thought we’d check-in and offer up some additional complimentary materials.
Feel free to peruse at your leisure:
- White Paper: Multi-Site Pivotal Cloud Foundry: Deployment Topology Patterns and Practices <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/multi-site-pivotal-cloud-foundry-deployment-topology-patterns-and-practices?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=content-syndication-q118]]> - eBook: Cloud Native Foundations <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks/cloud-native-designing-change-tolerant-software?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=content-syndication-q118]]> - Analyst Report: The Total Economic Impact™ of Pivotal Cloud Foundry <[[https://content.pivotal.io/analyst-reports/the-total-economic-impact-of-pivotal-cloud-foundry?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=content-syndication-q118]]> - White Paper: Speed Thrills: How to Harness the Power of CI/CD for Your Development Team <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/speed-thrills-how-to-harness-the-power-of-ci-cd-for-your-development-team?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=content-syndication-q118]]> - eBook: Crafting Your Cloud-Native Strategy <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks/crafting-your-cloud-native-strategy?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=content-syndication-q118]]>
None of these strike your fancy? Go to our Resources Page <[[https://content.pivotal.io/resources?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=content-syndication-q118]]> for a whole plethora of white papers, case studies, webinars, customer stories, and more. Or stay up to date with Pivotal news by subscribing to our weekly newsletter here <[[https://pivotal.io/newsletter-subscription?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=content-syndication-q118]]>.
And if you don’t want to hear from us, we understand - you can always unsubscribe from receiving these emails here <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/UnsubscribePage.html?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=content-syndication-q118]]>.
Thanks, The Pivotal Team
© 2018 Pivotal Software, Inc. 875 Howard Street, Fifth Floor, San Francisco, CA 94103. Published in the USA. <[[http://info.pivotal.io/ToAIA000v0000UX20N00CJ0]]>Unsubscribe <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/UnsubscribePage.html]]>.
